name: Wrecking Ball
description: Hammond, the genetically-engineered hamster, rolls across the battlefield in his highly mobile Wrecking Ball mech. With an arsenal of weapons and the power of momentum, he will crush any enemies who get in his way

abilities.name: Grappling Claw
abilities.description: Launch a grappling claw to rapidly swing around the area. Enables high speed collisions to damage and knockback enemies.

abilities.name: Roll
abilities.description: Transform into a ball and increase maximum movement speed.

abilities.name: Piledriver
abilities.description: Slam into the ground below to damage and launch enemies upward.

abilities.name: Adaptive Shield
abilities.description: Create temporary personal extra health. Amount increases with more enemies nearby.

abilities.name: Minefield
abilities.description: Deploy a massive field of proximity mines.

story: This hamster’s genetic therapy on the Horizon Lunar Colony resulted in his greatly increased size and intellect. Hammond taught himself engineering and mechanics, and escaped to earth, landing amidst the Junkers of the Australian Outback. There, he modified his escape pod into a battle mech called Wrecking Ball and became a champion gladiator and the bodyguard of the notorious Junker Queen.
